Author: scarletfawn
Text: I've done that but with a person that knows about my struggles. She's still fine with being honest about my looks, it's not her fault if I get triggered.

Author: kenodhagxjah
Text: idk if it's either my intense need for people to notice that i've lost weight/look thin or my crippling fear that someone will be onto me but i can never dare to ask anyone if i look thin.. i wanted to tho so i feel like it's completely normal to seek validation
